headline: Amphenol Combines CEO And Chairman Roles As Governance Balance Shifts
summary: Amphenol (NYSE:APH) has appointed CEO R. Adam Norwitt to also serve as Chairman in an upcoming board transition. Longstanding Chairman Martin H. Loeffler will retire from the board after more than five decades with the company. The change represents a planned shift in leadership at the top of Amphenol’s corporate governance structure. Amphenol, a major supplier of interconnect and sensor solutions to sectors such as communications, automotive, industrial, aerospace and defense, is pairing...
